long_description: Light, comfortable and precise, the Garmin Approach S4 Golf Watch is loaded with more than 30,000 golf courses and has a Green View button for quick access to the green with manual pin positioning. Sunlight readable, high-resolution touchscreen display. Extra-long-life battery lasts up to 10 hours in GPS mode and 6 weeks in watch mode. Preloaded with more than 30,000 international courses with no subscriptions or fees. Precise distance to the front, back and middle of greens plus layups and doglegs. Detailed stat tracking for better analysis of your game. The Garmin Approach S4 Golf Watch receives email, texts and alerts.
short_description: Light, comfortable and precise, the Garmin Approach S4 Golf Watch is loaded with more than 30,000 golf courses and has a Green View button for quick access to the green with manual pin positioning.
